item.description:
http://www.kevmarv.com/expo.asp?type=show_boston

The Boston bike show is January 12 and 13 at the World Trade center in Boston. 

I am not organizing a group to go...........but this is informational and feel free to rsvp and try to hook up with others that might rsvp.

The show is usually a good place to find vendors for things like leather gloves, jackets, chaps and other odd and sundry items you may need.

There is a charge of $17 to get in.............but worth it if you need to buy stuff. 

There is a $2 off coupon on the show's website.

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Boston Bike Show
